review: I ordered this because of my love of Amazon and Prime services.  Low and behold... after waiting for a MONTH because the device wasn't available, I was sent a BRICK.  No signal.  Changed HDMI ports, changed power, used the HDMI adapter, NOTHING.  Was told by my Amazon Fire Customer Service representative to plug the fire stick directly into an outlet -- because it supposedly WON'T WORK when plugged into a surge protector!!  Seriously?!?!?  It still didn't work - glad I wasted my time on that "fix" to my problem.I'm buying a Roku.  Hope you will too, because Amazon clearly knows how to make basic cables, but they fail at making anything more advanced.
